sen.j: 御幸町通（ごこまちどおり）は京都市内の南北の通りの一つ。
sen.e: Gokomachi-dori Street is one of the streets in Kyoto City that run in the north-south direction.
Gokomachi-dori Street is one of the streets in Kyoto City that run in the north-south direction.
Gokomachi-dori Street is one of the streets in Kyoto City that run in the north-south direction.

sen.j: 寺町通の一本西にあたり、北は丸太町通から南は五条通までである。
sen.e: It is one block west of Teramachi-dori Street and stretches from Marutamachi-dori Street to the north and Gojo-dori Street to the south.
It is one block west of Teramachi-dori Street and stretches from Marutamachi-dori Street to the north and Gojo-dori Street to the south.
It is one block west of Teramachi-dori Street and stretches from Marutamachi-dori Street to the north and Gojo-dori Street to the south.

sen.j: 平安京には存在せず、豊臣秀吉による天正の地割で新設された通りである。
sen.e: It did not exist when the city was Heian-kyo but was newly build by Hideyoshi TOYOTOMO under Tensho no Jiwari land allotment plan.
It did not exist when the city was Heian-kyo but was newly build by Hideyoshi TOYOTOMO under Tensho no Jiwari land allotment plan.
It did not exist when the city was Heian-kyo but was newly build by Hideyoshi TOYOTOMO under Tensho no Jiwari land allotment plan.

sen.j: 通り名の由来は秀吉が大阪（あるいは伏見）から御所に参内する時に使ったためなど諸説がある。
sen.e: The origin of the street name remains unclear. One theory is that the name derives from Hideyoshi having traveled the street when paying a visit to the Imperial Court from Osaka (or Fushimi).
The origin of the street name remains unclear; one theory is that the name derives from Hideyoshi having traveled the street when paying a visit to the Imperial Court from Osaka (or Fushimi).
sen.cmt: 分割は不要と考え、一文に訂正しました。
sen.e: The origin of the street name remains unclear; one theory is that the name derives from Hideyoshi having traveled the street when paying a visit to the Imperial Court from Osaka (or Fushimi).

sen.j: 三条通と四条通の間には、三条御幸町のアートコンプレックス1928をはじめ若者向けの文化施設・商店などが多い。
sen.e: The street between Sanjo-dori and Shijo-dori streets has many cultural facilities, such as Art Complex 1928 in Sanjo Gokomachi, and shops catering to young people.
The street between Sanjo-dori and Shijo-dori streets has many cultural facilities, such as Art Complex 1928 in Sanjo Gokomachi, and shops catering to young people.
The street between Sanjo-dori and Shijo-dori streets has many cultural facilities, such as Art Complex 1928 in Sanjo Gokomachi, and shops catering to young people.
